titleStmt.title: Sick-bed thoughts, upon those words of the apostle in Phil. 1, 23 ... Part. I containing an answer to that great and solemn question, what that state and condition is, which a person must be found in, before he can have good and sufficient ground, not to be affraid, or unwilling to dye? / by J.B.
titleStmt.author: Batchiler, John, ca. 1615-1674.

titleStmt.title: Sick-bed thoughts, upon those words of the apostle in Phil. 1, 23 ... Part.
